Whilst using public WiFi advertised in this app, please keep security in mind.
Although public WiFi is convenient there are risks. Such as Man-in-the-middle (MITM) attacks, Malware distribution, WiFi snooping and sniffing.
Luckily, there are ways to protect yourself from these risks. Such as: \n• Use a VPN. \n• Avoid accessing sensitive information. \n• Stick to websites that use "HTTPS" in the URL. \n• Use two-factor authentication. \n• Keep your operating system and software up to date. \n• Use antivirus software such as Norton or Malwarebytes
